Entry.JapaneseText: パレスグドラの魔科学兵器の 被害はどうなっている
Entry.EnglishText: How much damage has Palace Ggdra's Mana Cannon caused?

Entry.JapaneseText: 詳細は不明ですが、 パレスグドラ国内には 甚大な被害が出ています
Entry.EnglishText: We are unsure of the details. However the inside of Palace Ggdra has suffered immense collateral damage.

Entry.JapaneseText: それと……世界全域で、 マナの著しい減少が 観測されています
Entry.EnglishText: Also... All through the world there have been reports of Mana shortage crises.

Entry.JapaneseText: 自らの勝利のために 滅びを選んだか…… 何ということを……
Entry.EnglishText: So they chose a victory by means of destroying themselves and everyone else. How could it come to this...?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……マナを失った世界…… ……わが星にとっては 『死』を意味する
Entry.EnglishText: With this much Mana loss around the world...it means this planet will die...

Entry.JapaneseText: ご安心ください、ダオス様
大樹カーラーンの根元に 『希望のひとしずく』が 残っております
Entry.EnglishText: Deep inside the roots Great Kharlan Tree we still have the Guardian of the Tree, our Tear of Hope intact.

Entry.JapaneseText: 我が国の民だけ 救えるということか……
Entry.EnglishText: All the news I hear about are from my country's nation's subordinates...

Entry.JapaneseText: 大国の王として…… 貧しい二国に救いの手を 差し伸べることもできた……
Entry.EnglishText: Being the great King of the major nation in this world...I should have been able to help smaller countries with their economic problems and conflicts...

Entry.JapaneseText: 欲にまみれた武器商人たちを 止めることも 可能だったかも知れぬ
Entry.EnglishText: I should have been able to stop the greedy weapon traders and prevent possible civil outbreaks...

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、それを 私は看過したのだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Yet, I shut my eyes off and let hell break out loose...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は……なんと 不甲斐なき王だ…… いや……
Entry.EnglishText: I...am a despicable King for this country...

Entry.JapaneseText: これから私は 大樹カーラーンを求めて はるかな場所へ飛ぶ
Entry.EnglishText: After this I should attempt to secure the Great Kharlan Tree's security.

Entry.JapaneseText: 急がねばならぬ。 全てが、滅びる前に……
Entry.EnglishText: I need to act quickly...before we are all doomed...
